text: Primers, MIDs and ribosomal RNA sequences were trimmed from the reads. Sequences were compared with all available sequences in the nonredundant Genbank database [16] via the BlastN (http://blast.ncbI.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi) tool [17] . The following Blast settings were used: expect threshold: 1000, Match/ Mismatch Scores: 1.-1, Gap Costs: Existence: 2 Extension: 1. The blast output was subsequently used to create a taxonomic
